but not in war, were sent into combat zones under-equipped, ill-trained and in inflated numbers, the report reads. As a result, the`` ghost soldiers'' often couldn't perform their duties. Generals in the field, unable to obtain sufficient civil affairs units, sent reservists into harm's way without hardened armored vehicles, protective plates for their armored vests and machine guns, the report reads. er Milliardenwerte in Deutschland gebunkert haben soll. Sollte Hosni Mubarak nach Deutschland kommen, drohen Menschenrechtler bereits mit Klagen. Der Generalsekret?r des European Center For Constitutional and Human Rights ECCHR, Wolfgang Kaleck , sagte der Zeitung: Man muss davon ausgehen, dass in gypten in den letzten Jahren oder Jahrzehnten massiv gefoltert wurde und dass das unter Hosni Mubaraks rechtlicher Verantwortung geschah. Nach Inkrafttreten des deutschen V?lkerstrafgesetzbuches seien die deutschen Beh?rden in der Pflicht, eine Strafverfolgung aufzunehmen, wenn Verd?chtige sich in Deutschland aufhielten. Rechtsanwalt Wolfgang Kaleck hatte bereits mit seiner Strafanzeige gegen den fr?heren US-Verteidigungsminister Donald Rumsfeld f?r Furore gesorgt.

structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured'', suggesting that perhaps the move was forced. For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company . Larry Page , who founded the company with Sergey Brin , will now run the company in the CEO role with Eric Schmidt moving to an`` executive chairman'' position.`` Larry Page will now lead product

our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company,'' href="http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/01/update-from-chairman.html" target="_blank"> Eric Schmidt explains. Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. While Larry Page manages Google's day-to-day operations, co-founder Sergey Brin will work on new products and strategic projects.
